name: Top Crops
description:
It's harvest time in Riff's farm! Her crops grow fast, but they wither fast too. You must plant, water, and harvest as many crops as possible, while making sure they don't wither and die.  But watch out, a zombie is coming for you! Running into it will lower your score, so be careful! Don't forget though: a clean farm is a happy farm! You also have to stay organized and put objects back on the table before switching to another one. Manage your resources and evade well to last all night and earn the high score!

Controls: 

  • WASD to move
  • Space to pick up and use items
    • Only one object may be off the table at a time
  • Hold Left Shift to sprint
    • You can sprint for up to one second in a row, but upon exhausting the sprint timer, you must wait two seconds before sprinting again

Coded by: Leo/Sleop Deprivation (https://sleop-deprivation.itch.io/) and Matthew (account link pending)

Art and music by: Hudson/SwitchNX (https://youtube.com/channel/UCOz5Zud8WOT-eFGrmUF8j-A)

Made for the RIT Game Developers Club Fall 2022 Game Jam in 2 days

Theme: Wither
